items.question: What language are Tyrell and his wife Joanna speaking?
items.answer: During their conversations, Tyrell speaks Swedish, and his wife Joanna speaks Danish.

items.question: What does that big E at E Corp stand for?
items.answer: It doesn't stand for anything and is open to interpretation. "E" is used a lot in generic tech corporate verbiage from e-mail to e-invites, where it usually means electronic.One popular theory is it may be "Esmail Corp" if you skip to the end of most of the episodes, the e corp logo shows up with the Esmail corp written. This obviously refers to the creator of the show, Sam Esmail. Evil Corp is also the name of a real life hacker group.

spoilerItems.question: 104, 21:42 Min: Mr Robot carrying Elliot and nagotiating if they can pass together. The guy anwers: OK, he can go in, but ONLY him! Mr Robot: I gotta come WITH (him).=> Why is this the only guy in the whole series able to see both at the SAME time?
spoilerItems.answer: That scene is part of a hallucination during his morphine detox. There is no building, it's all in this head.
